definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)

sentences.english: From in this example in Leaning Tower of Pisa , I learned a lot of.
sentences.chinese: 從比薩斜塔這個例子中，我學到了很多。

sentences.english: Unlike the tower in Pisa, the Capital Gate building has been deliberately engineered to slant.
sentences.chinese: 和比薩斜塔不同，這座塔的傾斜是刻意建造而成。

sentences.english: Both because of its inclination and its beauty, the Tower has been the object of very special attention.
sentences.chinese: 由於傾斜和獨特的美，比薩斜塔吸引了世人的眼光。

sentences.english: In Pisa , I see the Leaning Tower of Pisa.
sentences.chinese: 可是比薩斜塔爲什麼會傾斜呢？

sentences.english: The Tower of Pisa is the bell tower of that city's cathedral in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 比薩斜塔位於意大利，是大教堂的鐘樓。

sentences.english: How far does it lean? Nearly five times farther than the Leaning Tower of Pisa in Italy。
sentences.chinese: 其傾斜度幾乎是意大利比薩斜塔傾斜度的5倍。

sentences.english: Why does the Leaning Tower of Piza in lean?
sentences.chinese: 意大利的比薩斜塔爲什麼會傾斜呢？

definition: Chihkan Tower (formerly Fort Provintia) in Tainan, Taiwan (also written 赤嵌樓|赤嵌楼[Chi4 kan3 lou2])
Old town district/Gucheng district of Lijiang city 麗江市|丽江市[Li4 jiang1 shi4], Yunnan
Great stone bridge or Dashiqiao county level city in Yingkou 營口|营口, Liaoning
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Mount of Olives (in the Christian passion story)
Andes mountain chain of South America
Kai Tak Airport, international airport of Hong Kong from 1925 to 1998
